pull_request.title: Fuel: List models by owner on insert menu

pullrequest.title: Fuel: List models by owner on insert menu

content.raw:
Yeah I see what you're saying... And in any case we will need to have some sort of insert menu for local models (non-fuel).

But we should keep in mind that to have a nice browsing experience inside the native UI we will need to duplicate much of what we already have on the browser, i.e. pagination (very important), thumbnails, metadata, search, etc.
content.html:
Yeah I see what you're saying... And in any case we will need to have some sort of insert menu for local models (non-fuel).

But we should keep in mind that to have a nice browsing experience inside the native UI we will need to duplicate much of what we already have on the browser, i.e. pagination (very important), thumbnails, metadata, search, etc.

pull_request.title: Fuel: List models by owner on insert menu

pullrequest.title: Fuel: List models by owner on insert menu

content.raw:
I think this is super cool but we should also consider the usability aspects of this design. For example, I like dropping files from my computer onto google drive instead of going through the file browser dialog but what if I could easily find my files in the left panel of the browser? 

I am leaning towards keeping the fuel menu \(in addition to this cool drag-and-drop feature\), and have a search bar for finding models inside gazebo.
content.html:
I think this is super cool but we should also consider the usability aspects of this design. For example, I like dropping files from my computer onto google drive instead of going through the file browser dialog but what if I could easily find my files in the left panel of the browser?

I am leaning towards keeping the fuel menu (in addition to this cool drag-and-drop feature), and have a search bar for finding models inside gazebo.

pull_request.title: Fuel: List models by owner on insert menu

update.description:
This makes the insert widget a bit more organized. Also added the full model URL as a tooltip.

![fuelbyowner.gif](https://bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/238376683-fuelbyowner.gif)

There's still a lot of room for improvement; we need a plan for once we start having thousands of users uploading thousands of models... It would also be nice to always list `openrobotics` on top. In any case, the whole insert menu needs a makeover so it's more pleasant to browse through models.

This is broken off branch `fuel_cache`.

Remember to install `fuel-tools` and set the env var

`export USE_IGNITION_FUEL=true; gazebo --verbose`

Don't be worried about ABI, `FuelModelDatabase` is not installed.
update.title: Fuel: List models by owner on insert menu

pullrequest.title: Fuel: List models by owner on insert menu

content.raw:
Actually I've been leaning towards removing Fuel from the insert menu, and instead support dragging from the browser:

![dragfromfuel.gif](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/1886233801-dragfromfuel.gif)

So I think this whole menu will be gone soon :smile:
content.html:
Actually I've been leaning towards removing Fuel from the insert menu, and instead support dragging from the browser:

So I think this whole menu will be gone soon
